org.owasp.esapi
Class SecurityConfigurationWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.esapi.SecurityConfigurationWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
SecurityConfiguration
public class SecurityConfigurationWrapper
extends Object
implements SecurityConfiguration

Simple wrapper implementation of SecurityConfiguration. This allows for easy subclassing and property fixups for unit tests. Note that there are some compilers have issues with Override attributes on methods implementing a interface method with some compilers. Technically Override on such methods is a 1.6 feature so they are commented out here.
